planet.name: Kepler-126 d
KOI-260 d
KOI-260.02
KIC 8292840 d
KIC 8292840.02
planet.description: Kepler-126 d has been discovered by the Kepler spacecraft and was originally classified as a planet candidate. A new statistical analysis led by a team at NASA Ames Research Center has validated the planet with more than 99 percent confidence. Although many parameters of Kepler-126 d are still unknown, the object is highly unlikely to be a false positive.
